title: New Hire Brings Google’s Consumer Mobile Perspective to Whitepages’ Suite of Mobile Apps
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 7:00 AM   WhitePages 
SEATTLE -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Whitepages , the number one source of contact information in North America, today announced the hire of Mayur Kamat. Formerly a product lead at Google, Kamat will head up the company’s communications experience division and focus on enhancing its best-in-class caller ID and spam/scam protection mobile apps. Prior to joining Whitepages, Kamat was part of the founding team of Google Hangouts and led the product to over 1 billion downloads. He also drove product and business strategy for Google Voice and its integration with Hangouts. 
Kamat will serve as Vice President of Mobile at Whitepages, which now boasts a massive database of phone record information to help consumers identify unknown callers and block scam calls. Part of Kamat’s role at the company will be to oversee its existing Caller ID and phone scam protection apps for Android and iOS. 
“Both Google Voice and Hangouts were built on the concept of leveraging a consumer’s mobile phone identity for communication services. Our mission at Whitepages is to give users control of their mobile identity as well as to foster a better understanding of how their data is represented to the world,” says Kamat. “I am hoping to leverage my experience at Google to deliver great communication value among Whitepages’ suite of products which are already used by millions of people.” 
Through the use of the company’s industry leading mobile data, Kamat will further develop Whitepages apps to leverage network effects and grow their reach to ultimately help hundreds of millions of users better manage their phone calls and protect against the increasing number of phone scams. 
“We’re thrilled to welcome this tremendous new addition to the efficient and high-impact team at Whitepages,” says CEO and Founder Alex Algard. “Mayur Kamat is one of the most knowledgeable minds of our time when it comes to communicating the value of phone data to consumers in today’s digital landscape. We are excited to see what he accomplishes at Whitepages.” 
Kamat will be based at the Whitepages headquarters in downtown Seattle. 
About Whitepages: 
Whitepages is the leading source for contact information in North America and is at the forefront of developing services that help people find and verify personal and business identities in the digital world. With a top 40 website, 55 million monthly visitors and several million downloads for their suite of mobile apps, Whitepages offers access to more than 250 million personal identities. Whitepages uses its extensive data insights to monitor phone-based threats for consumers and businesses, detecting more than one billion robo, telemarketing and spam calls and texts to date. Whitepages also operates Whitepages Pro, a Web and API-based service which helps businesses verify the identities of their customers. To learn more, visit about.whitepages.com .
